About

About

I’m a senior marketing strategist and web developer working in the healthcare field. I have 10+ years of marketing/sales experience and recently obtained a Master’s degree in Communications: New Media and Marketing at Southern New Hampshire University. I’m also currently enrolled in a Web Programming Bootcamp at Northwestern University, with an expected completion date of 5/19/18.

I have a passion for videography and photography. I’m looking to utilize my passion and experience, along with my education to further my digital marketing career.

Technology is constantly evolving

I started coding because I didn't want to become a dinosaur.

I can't believe I'm actually saying this but back when I was in college, social media was just starting.

Digital marketing wasn't really a thing back then. How was I to know this was the field I wanted to be in. Now that I'm here, my goal is to continue to learn and adapt to the revolving door that is the tech industry.

Portfolio

I love to share my experiences and new technologies.

Web design can be tricky, but incredibly satisfying when all your hard work comes together. Take a look at my blog and join me as I tackle web programming.
